name: Salesforce Nonprofit Cloud
logo: https://cdn.simpleicons.org/salesforce/00A1E0
description: Enterprise donor CRM built on Salesforce with NPSP (Nonprofit Success Pack) for comprehensive constituent relationship management.

name: Blackbaud Raiser's Edge NXT

name: WealthEngine

name: iWave

checklist: Canadian vs US data scope defined

name: Mailchimp
logo: https://cdn.simpleicons.org/mailchimp/FFE01B
description: Email marketing platform with audience segmentation, campaign analytics, and automation workflows for donor engagement.

name: Constant Contact

name: Stripe
